Title: Supply and price uncertainty may pose challenges to Asia’s proposed FSRU import projects
Description: A sharp drop in LNG prices this year has led to more interest in Asia for LNG import projects deploying floating storage regasification units. But, how many projects will actually come online in the next few years is unclear, with the supply and financing of FSRUs and uncertainty over LNG prices potentially posing challenges to their development.
Author: CK

Title: Nigeria’s LNG exports seen stable in May; force majeure on upstream supplies still in place
Description: Nigeria LNG’s exports are expected to show little change in May against April and year-earlier levels, with this reflecting upstream gas supply constraints that continue to keep a force majeure on upstream supplies in place.
Author: CK
